Ensure the Dartmouth Atlas HRR boundary shapefile is available locally

Source: R/data_cache.R
ensure_hrr_shapefile.Rd

Downloads the shapefile archive from the Dartmouth Atlas website when it is not already present in the user's cache directory. The archive is expanded in-place and the path to the .shp file is returned.

Usage

ensure_hrr_shapefile(quiet = TRUE)

Arguments

quiet

Logical flag passed to download_large_file() to silence the underlying download tooling.

Value

The absolute path to the HRR boundary shapefile.

On this page
